verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <WH4427> Ma-loch reigneth יִרְגְּז֣וּ <WH7264> yir-ge-Zu tremble עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim; let the people יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> yo-Shev he sitteth כְּ֝רוּבִ֗ים <WH3742> ke-ru-Vim, [between] the cherubims תָּנ֥וּט <WH5120> ta-Nut be moved הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. let the earth

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> be-tzi-Yon in Zion גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol; [is] great וְרָ֥ם <WH7311> ve-Ram and he [is] high ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָֽעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> Ha-'am-Mim. above all the people

יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> yo-Du Let them praise שִׁ֭מְךָ <WH8034> me-cha name גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol thy great וְנוֹרָ֗א <WH3372> ve-no-Ra, and terrible קָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh [for] it [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וְעֹ֥ז <WH5797> ve-'Oz strength מֶלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> me-leCh The king's מִשְׁפָּ֪ט <WH4941> mish-Pat judgment אָ֫הֵ֥ב <WH157> 'a-Hev also loveth אַ֭תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah You כּוֹנַ֣נְתָּ <WH3559> ko-Nan-ta thou dost establish מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <WH4339> mei-sha-Rim; equity מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> mish-Pat judgment וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah, and righteousness בְּיַעֲקֹ֤ב׀ <WH3290> be-ya-'a-Ko in Jacob אַתָּ֬ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta. thou executest

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <WH7311> rom-Mu Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh ye the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ <WH7812> Ve-hish-ta-cha-vu and worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <WH1916> la-ha-Dom stool רַגְלָ֗יו <WH7272> rag-Lav, be able to endure קָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh [for] he [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן׀ <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron and Aaron בְּֽכֹהֲנָ֗יו <WH3548> be-cho-ha-Nav, among his priests וּ֭שְׁמוּאֵל <WH8050> U-she-mu-'el and Samuel בְּקֹרְאֵ֣י <WH7121> be-ko-re-'Ei among them that call שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo; upon his name קֹרִ֥אים <WH7121> ko-Rim they called אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- upon יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh upon the LORD וְה֣וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu and He יַעֲנֵֽם׃ <WH6030> ya-'a-Nem. and he answered

בְּעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> be-'am-Mud pillar עָ֭נָן <WH6051> 'A-non unto them in the cloudy יְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber He spake אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem; about שָׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> sha-me-Ru they kept עֵ֝דֹתָ֗יו <WH5713> 'e-do-Tav, his testimonies וְחֹ֣ק <WH2706> ve-Chok and the ordinance נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> na-tan- [that] he gave לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵינוּ֮ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Nu our God אַתָּ֪ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You עֲנִ֫יתָ֥ם <WH6030> 'a-Ni-Tam Thou answeredst אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el thou wast a God נֹ֭שֵׂא <WH5375> No-se that forgavest הָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ta become לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> la-Hem; to them וְ֝נֹקֵ֗ם <WH5358> ve-no-Kem, them though thou tookest vengeance עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃ <WH5949> a-li-lo-Tam. of their inventions

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <WH7311> rom-Mu Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God וְ֭הִֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ <WH7812> Ve-hish-ta-cha-vu and worship לְהַ֣ר <WH2022> le-Har hill קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho; at his holy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For קָ֝ד֗וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh, [is] holy יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God
